title: Andy Parsons: Bafflingly Optimistic
overview: After a completely sold out and critically acclaimed run at the Edinburgh Festival, Andy is back with his brand new show, Bafflingly Optimistic.  Weâ€™ve been visited by the Four Horsemen in the form of Disease, Death, War and overpriced Ketchup, so what hope can there be? Andy is Bafflingly Optimistic.  'For those who worry that we are going to hell in a handcart, Parsons will at least make you enjoy the ride' - The i
